member.summary: Close (destroy) the window. The Window instance remains valid and you can call Create to recreate the window

member.summary: Transform a point from local coordinates into global coordinates (ie it applies the object's origin, translation, rotation and scale to the point)

member.summary: Vertical and horizontal scale of the object
